meanings.definition: A person who is skilled or proficient at a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: The dabster at the bakery made the most delicious cakes.
meanings.sent2: She is a dabster when it comes to playing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The dabster chef turned simple ingredients into a gourmet feast.
meanings.sent4: He was a dabster with numbers, always calculating things quickly.
meanings.sent5: The dabster artist painted a masterpiece that left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: To perform a task with skill or expertise.
meanings.sent1: She can dabster through the dance routine flawlessly.
meanings.sent2: He dabsters through the coding challenges effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to dabster its way out of the tangled yarn.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic dabstered the engine back to working condition in no time.
meanings.sent5: The chef dabstered the recipe, creating a dish that amazed everyone.
